response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to extend this offer with a special consideration. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects the significant value you see in the product and allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We are confident that this price will be mutually beneficial and ensure that both parties walk away satisfied. Please let us know if you require any further information or clarification. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
